video_prompt: Giant glowing mushroom caps subtly pulsate. Floating orbs of light drift through the air. Warm light within stone houses flickers. Vines on structures sway gently. Leaves on plants quiver.
image_prompt: A fantastical village seamlessly integrated into a lush magical forest, dominated by colossal, glowing orange-red mushrooms with brilliant golden undersides. Stone houses with warm, glowing windows and arched doorways are built into or nestled beneath the mushrooms, covered in vines and moss. A winding stone path leads through the vibrant green landscape. Tiny sparkling orbs of light float in the air, under a dark blue and grey sky with cloud-like formations, creating a warm, inviting, and mystical ambiance.
refined_video_prompt: Mushroom caps subtly pulsate. Orbs of light drift through the air. Warm light flickers within structures. Vines sway gently. Leaves quiver softly.
